global.orShareQr: 或將帳戶分享為 QR 碼
global.requestCopied: 請求連結已複製至剪貼簿
global.name: 名稱
global.txvalidationerr: 交易驗證錯誤(逾時):無法可靠地連接網路來驗證交易
global.subject: 主體
global.biometryIsNotSupported: 此裝置不支援生物識別驗證!
global.biometricChangeError: 由於裝置上的生物識別數據或系統設定變更,生物識別驗證已停用。請手動前往設定 -> 安全性 -> 生物識別驗證以重新啟用
global.atLeastOneSymbol: 至少一個特殊字元(! @ , ? 等)
global.tooManyAttempts: 嘗試失敗次數過多。請在 %{after} 分鐘後再試。
global.passcodeAttemptExceed: 密碼嘗試次數已超過限制,請稍後再試。
global.autoWipeAlert: 您已嘗試解鎖應用程式 %{times} 次失敗,再失敗 1 次後,應用程式將被重設,您的所有帳戶資料將會遺失。
global.cannotValidateCurrentTimeWithServer: 無法同步應用程式時間與伺服器時間。請確保您已連接網路!
global.pleaseAddAccountToSignTheTransaction: 請新增帳戶以簽署交易
global.pleaseAddAccountToAccessXApp: 請新增帳戶以存取 xApp
global.noSpendableAccountIsAvailableForSendingP: 目前沒有可用餘額來發送付款。
global.pleaseCheckSessionLogForMoreInfo: 請查看連線紀錄以取得更多資訊!
global.signedTransactionDetectedSubmit: 偵測到已簽署的交易,要提交至帳本嗎?
global.weNeedYourPermissionToUseYourCamera: 我們需要您的權限才能使用相機
global.looksLikeYouAreOffline: 看起來您已離線(無網路連線)
global.unableToConnectToXRPLNodePleaseCheckYour: 無法連接網路節點,請檢查您的網路連線並重試
global.thisAccountIsReportedAsScamOrFraudulentA: 此發送者已被標記為可疑活動,如垃圾訊息。請在互動前仔細確認以保護您的資金。
global.biometricIsNotAvailable: 生物識別(指紋或 Face ID)無法使用。如果您的裝置支援生物識別驗證,請先進行設定(系統設定)。
global.pushErrorPermissionMessage: 無法註冊推送通知。這可能是由於連線問題導致無法從 Firebase 伺服器取得 FCM 令牌。請確保您有有效的網路連線。或者,要授予所需的通知權限,請前往系統設定並確保 Xaman > 通知 已啟用。
global.thePasswordYouEnteredIsIncorrectExplain: 您輸入的密碼不正確。要簽署交易,您需要輸入正確的密碼。這是您將想要簽署的帳戶新增到 Xaman 時輸入的密碼。
global.thePasscodeYouEnteredIsIncorrectExplain: 您輸入的密碼不正確。要簽署交易,您需要輸入正確的密碼。這是您第一次設定 Xaman 時輸入的密碼。
global.unableToFetchCurrencyRate: 無法取得貨幣匯率,請確保您已連接網路
global.xAppWantsToSendSessionLogs:
此 xApp 正在請求您的「連線紀錄」。連線紀錄不包含個人資訊,除了您的帳戶地址和帳本連線紀錄。

如果您想先檢查連線紀錄的內容,請前往設定 - 進階 - 連線紀錄。

您要允許應用程式存取連線紀錄資訊嗎?
global.transactionFeeIsNotSet: 交易手續費尚未設定,請等待交易手續費設定完成後再試!
global.unableToSetAccountSequence: 無法設定帳戶 Sequence,請檢查您是否已連接網路。
global.unableToGetLastClosedLedger: 無法取得最後關閉的帳本,請檢查您是否已連接網路。
global.hookFeeNotice: 注意:總交易手續費包含 %{hookFee} %{nativeAsset} 的 hooks 費用。
global.doNotCloseTheApp:
請勿關閉 Xaman
請勿鎖定您的裝置
global.selectCurve: 請選擇金鑰對要使用的曲線(如果選擇錯誤,您將取得錯誤的 r-address 且可能無法簽署)

onboarding.slideOne_title:
帳本上的
付款與
付款請求
onboarding.slideTwo_desc: 新增多個帳戶,可選擇完整存取模式或唯讀模式。使用完整存取帳戶發送交易並簽署請求。
onboarding.slideThree_desc: Xaman 應用程式和平台以安全為優先建立。無需再次輸入您的私鑰,從您自己的可信任裝置簽署交易。
onboarding.slideFour_desc: 您也可以發送和接收 XRP 及其他可信代幣
onboarding.v2main2: 安心保管您的加密貨幣。
onboarding.v2homepage_noacc2: 匯入您的現有帳戶或建立新帳戶。

setupPasscode.passCodeDescription: 我們使用密碼來鎖定應用程式、確認設定並保護您的帳戶安全。
setupPasscode.warnNeedPasscode: 您需要密碼來解鎖應用程式
setupPasscode.UnableToStoreThePasscode: 無法儲存密碼。這不應該發生。錯誤報告已發送至 Xaman 支援團隊。請透過 support@xaman.app 聯絡我們以取得更多資訊。
setupPasscode.weakPasscodeDescription: 所選的密碼容易被猜到。我們建議您選擇更強的密碼。

setupBiometry.biometryDescription: 為了讓您的帳戶更安全,您可以啟用生物識別驗證(FaceID/TouchID)。

setupPermissions.permissionDescription: 我們使用推送通知來發送簽署請求
setupPermissions.pushRegisterError: 目前似乎無法啟用推送通知。您可以稍後在應用程式設定中的 設定 -> 進階 啟用它們。別擔心,您現在可以繼續設定!

setupTermOfService.XamanNotCustodialExplain:
Xaman is a non custodial wallet, meaning your funds aren't in Xaman custody, but 'live' on the XRP Ledger.

Only you can access your funds with your account secrets, as generated by Xaman or imported into Xaman.

This means Xaman and the Xaman team cannot access and cannot recover your funds if you make a mistake or lose your secret keys.
setupTermOfService.KeepYourSecretsSafeExplain:
只有您,使用您的帳戶私鑰,才能存取您的資金

您且只有您負責保管它們的安全,離線。

在多個離線位置記錄您的備份。
setupTermOfService.IWillKeepMySecretsSafeAndOffline: 我將保管好我的私鑰並離線存放。
setupTermOfService.transactionsArePermanentExplain:
Xaman 無法撤銷交易,也無法在您犯錯時恢復資金。

交易是即時且不可逆轉的。
setupTermOfService.iAmResponsibleForKeepingMyKeysAndFundsSa: 我負責保管好我的金鑰和資金安全
setupTermOfService.yourFundsLiveOnTheXRPLedger: 您的資金「存在」於帳本上
setupTermOfService.yourFundsLiveOnTheXRPLedgerExplain:
Xaman is an XRP ledger client application.

This means your XRP does not reside in Xaman but on the XRP Ledger.

Transactions sent and received are sent and received live on/by the XRP ledger.
setupTermOfService.myFundsAreRegisteredOnTheXRPLedger: All of my funds are stored and registered on the XRP Ledger, not on the Xaman application
setupTermOfService.neverShareYourSecretExplain:
Xaman 和 Xaman 支援部門絕不會要求您提供私鑰

如果有人要求,或要求您在某處輸入私鑰,您正被詐騙。

請務必與我們聯絡,提供您掌握的有關該事件的盡可能多的資訊。
setupTermOfService.IWillNeverGiveMySecretsToAnyone: 我絕不會與任何人分享私鑰,也不會在其他地方輸入
setupTermOfService.whenYouChangeYourPhoneExplain: 在新裝置上使用 Xaman 需要您重新輸入先前建立的所有帳戶的私鑰。
setupTermOfService.IWillKeepMySecretsSafeSoICanReEnterThemI: 我會將帳戶私鑰安全地離線保管,以便在取得新裝置時可以重新輸入。
setupTermOfService.questionsAndSupportExplain:
Please don’t hesitate to contact us if you have any further questions. Our FAQ and support channel can be found here: https://support.xaman.app.

Please note: This is THE ONLY trustworthy channel for XUMM support.
setupTermOfService.IOnlyTrustAnswersFromXamanSupportTeam: 我只會信任來自 https://support.xaman.app 的 Xaman 支援團隊的答覆

home.otherAssetsDesc: 帳本還允許您持有、發送和接收 %{nativeAsset} 以外的代幣餘額。這些代幣可以由帳本上的其他帳戶發行。如果您想要發送或接收非 %{nativeAsset} 代幣,您必須信任該非 %{nativeAsset} 代幣的發行者。
home.nativeAssetYouOwnVsYourSpendableBalance: 您擁有的 %{nativeAsset} 與可用餘額。
home.emptyAccountAddFirstAccount: 這裡有點空,請新增您的第一個帳戶。
home.shareReadonlyAccountWarning: 您擁有此唯讀帳戶的金鑰,還是這是您的交易所帳戶?
home.exchangeAccountReadonlyExplain: 您無法直接存入交易所帳戶:您需要目的地標籤才能這樣做。請從您的交易所取得目的地標籤,然後手動存入。

events.thirdPartyTxExplain: 此交易未影響您的帳戶餘額。
events.createURITokenSellOffer: 建立 URIToken 賣出報價
events.cancelURITokenSellOffer: 取消 URIToken 賣出報價
events.canNotFetchSignRequests: 無法取得帳戶簽署請求!
events.unableToLoadTheTransaction: 無法載入交易,請確保您已連接網路!
events.emptyEventsNoAccount: 因為您沒有帳戶,所以沒有事件。
events.theTransactionIsAlsoCancelOffer: 該交易還將取消 %{address} 的現有報價 #%{offerSequence}
events.theOfferExpiresAtUnlessCanceledOrConsume: 該報價將於 %{expiration} 到期,除非在此之前被取消或消費。
events.theTransactionWillCancelOffer: 該交易將取消 %{address} 的報價 #%{offerSequence}
events.itCanBeCanceledAfter: 它可以在 %{date} 之後取消
events.itCanBeFinishedAfter: 它可以在 %{date} 之後完成
events.escrowFinishExplain:
由 %{address} 觸發完成
托管金額 %{amount} %{currency} 已交付給 %{destination}
events.transferRateMayApplied: 此交易可能適用發行者收取的 %{transferRatePercentage} 轉帳費率。請參閱發行者帳戶以獲取更多資訊。
events.itWasInstructedToDeliverTheRemainingBala: 它被指示將剩餘餘額 %{amount} %{currency} 交付給 %{destination}
events.maximumAmountCheckIsAllowToDebit: Check 允許從發送者扣除的最大來源貨幣金額為 %{value} %{currency}
events.itWasInstructedToDeliverByCashingCheck: 它被指示透過兌現 ID 為 %{checkId} 的 Check 向 %{address} 交付 %{amount} %{currency}
events.theTransactionWillCancelCheckWithId: 該交易將取消 ID 為 %{checkId} 的 Check
events.itAuthorizesSendingPaymentsToThisAccount: 它授權 %{address} 向此帳戶發送付款
events.itRemovesAuthorizesSendingPaymentsToThis: 它移除了 %{address} 向此帳戶發送付款的授權
events.itRemovedTrustLineCurrencyTo: 它移除了到 %{issuer} 的信任線貨幣 %{currency}
events.itEstablishesTrustLineTo: 它建立 %{limit} 作為 %{address} 願意持有來自 %{issuer} 的 %{currency} 的最大金額。
events.itRemovesTheAccountEmailHash: 它移除了帳戶的電子郵件雜湊
events.itSetsAccountEmailHashTo: 它將帳戶的電子郵件雜湊設定為 %{emailHash}
events.itRemovesTheAccountMessageKey: 它移除了帳戶訊息金鑰
events.itSetsAccountMessageKeyTo: 它將帳戶訊息金鑰設定為 %{messageKey}
events.itRemovesTheAccountTransferRate: 它移除了帳戶轉帳費率
events.itSetsAccountTransferRateTo: 它將帳戶轉帳費率設定為 %{transferRate}
events.itSetsAccountMinterTo: 它將帳戶鑄造者設定為 %{minter}
events.itSetsAccountWalletLocatorTo: 它將帳戶錢包定位器設定為 %{walletLocator}
events.itRemovesTheAccountWalletLocator: 它移除了帳戶的錢包定位器
events.itSetsAccountWalletSizeTo: 它將帳戶錢包大小設定為 %{walletSize}
events.itRemovesTheAccountWalletSize: 它移除了帳戶的錢包大小
events.itCreatesTicketForThisAccount: 它為此帳戶建立了 %{ticketCount} 個 ticket。
events.createdTicketsSequence: 已建立的 tickets 序號 %{ticketsSequence}
events.pleaseReleaseThisEscrowUsingTheToolUsedT: 請使用建立此 Escrow 的工具/平台來釋放它。Xaman 無法釋放此 Escrow,因為其上有 Escrow 條件。
events.accountWillCreateAPaymentChannelTo: 帳戶 %{account} 將建立一個到 %{destination} 的 Payment Channel
events.accountCreatedAPaymentChannelTo: 帳戶 %{account} 建立了一個到 %{destination} 的 Payment Channel
events.theChannelHasASettlementDelay: 通道有 %{delay} 秒的結算延遲
events.itCanBeCancelledAfter: 它可以在 %{cancelAfter} 之後取消
events.thePaymentChannelWillBeClosed: Payment Channel 將關閉。任何剩餘資金將退回到來源帳戶。
events.thisTransactionIncreaseAccountReserve: 此交易增加了帳戶保留金 %{ownerReserve} %{nativeAsset}
events.thisTransactionDecreaseAccountReserve: 此交易減少了帳戶保留金 %{ownerReserve} %{nativeAsset}
events.nfTokenBurnExplain: 該交易將銷毀 ID 為 %{tokenID} 的 NFT 代幣
events.nfTokenModifyExplain: 該交易將修改 ID 為 %{tokenID} 的 NFT 代幣,URI 值將為 %{uri}
events.nftOfferSellExplain: %{address} 報價出售 ID 為 %{tokenID} 的 NFT 代幣以接收 %{amount} %{currency}
events.nftOfferBuyExplain: %{address} 報價支付 %{amount} %{currency} 以接收 ID 為 %{tokenID} 的 NFT 代幣
events.uriTokenOfferSellExplain: %{address} 報價出售 ID 為 %{tokenID} 的 URI token 以接收 %{amount} %{currency}
events.uriTokenOfferBuyExplain: %{address} 報價支付 %{amount} %{currency} 以接收 ID 為 %{tokenID} 的 URI token
events.thisNftOfferMayOnlyBeAcceptedBy: 此報價只能由 %{address} 接受
events.thisUriTokenOfferCanOnlyBeAcceptedBy: 此報價只能由 %{address} 接受
events.theOfferExpiresAtUnlessCanceledOrAccepte: 該報價將於 %{expiration} 到期,除非在此之前被取消或接受。
events.theTransactionWillCancelNftOffer: 該交易將取消 %{address} 的 NFT 報價,ID 為
events.nftAcceptOfferSellExplanation: %{address} 接受了 ID 為 %{offerID} 的 NFT 代幣報價,對應的 NFT 代幣 ID 為 %{tokenID},以接收 %{amount} %{currency}
events.nftAcceptOfferBuyExplanation: %{address} 接受了 ID 為 %{offerID} 的 NFT 代幣報價,支付 %{amount} %{currency} 以接收 ID 為 %{tokenID} 的 NFT 代幣
events.thisIsAnAccountSetTransaction: 這是一個 AccountSet 交易
events.thisIsAnSetRegularKeyTransaction: 這是一個 SetRegularKey 交易
events.itRemovesTheAccountRegularKey: 它移除了帳戶 Regular Key
events.itSetsAccountRegularKeyTo: 它將帳戶 Regular Key 設定為 %{regularKey}
events.thisTransactionDoesNotEffectAnyAccountSe: 此交易不影響任何帳戶設定。
events.thisTransactionClearTicket: 此交易清除(消費並移除)ticket #%{ticketSequence}
events.offerOnYouURIToken: 您的 URI Token 報價
events.thisOfferCanOnlyBeAcceptedByThirdParty: 此報價已設定第三方(例如經紀人)作為目的地。只有該帳戶可以接受該報價。
events.transactionDetailsDifferentNetworkError:
此交易在您連接的網路上無效。

請切換到 %{network} 並重試。
events.uriTokenBurnExplain: 該交易將銷毀 ID 為 %{tokenID} 的 URI token
events.uriTokenBuyExplain: %{address} 支付 %{amount} %{currency} 以接收 ID 為 %{tokenID} 的 URI token
events.invokeExplain: 該交易將在帳戶 %{destination} 中調用 hooks
events.uriTokenMintAmount: 該代幣的鑄造者已將初始售價設定為 %{value} %{currency}。
events.uriTokenDestinationExplain: 此代幣只能由 %{address} 購買
events.uriTokenSellOfferExplain: %{address} 報價出售 ID 為 %{uriToken} 的 URI token 以接收 %{value} %{currency}
events.thisURITokenOfferMayOnlyBeAcceptedBy: 此報價只能由 %{address} 接受
events.theTransactionWillCancelURITokenOffer: 該交易將取消 %{address} 對 ID 為 %{tokenId} 的 URI token 的賣出報價
events.claimRewardExplain: 這是一個領取獎勵交易
events.claimRewardExplainOptIn: 此交易選擇讓 %{address} 在未來領取獎勵
events.claimRewardExplainOptOut: 此交易選擇讓 %{address} 不在未來領取獎勵

xapp.theXAppHasNotBeenFullyLoaded: xApp 尚未完全載入。如果您在使用此 xApp 時遇到問題,請聯絡 xApp 開發者
xapp.unableToFetchXAppInfo: 無法取得 xApp 資訊!
xapp.xAppSupportNetworkError: 此 xApp 在您連接的網路上不可用
xapp.switchToSupportedNetworks: 請切換到以下支援的網路之一
xapp.xAppDoesNotHavePermissionToRunThisComman: 此 xApp 無權執行「%{command}」命令。如果您認為需要此權限,請聯絡支援。
xapp.appReadyToAcceptCommands: xApp 必須處於就緒狀態才能接受命令。

settings.showPerAssetWorth: 在主畫面顯示資產價格

settings.themeAutoSwitch: 自動切換淺色/深色模式
settings.notChangingYetBecauseLightMode: 您的裝置目前處於淺色模式,並自動切換。當您的裝置處於深色模式時,所選的深色模式主題將變為啟用狀態。
settings.areYouSureRemoveContact: 您確定要移除此聯絡人嗎?
settings.nodeChangeWarning: 您正在從 %{from} 切換到 %{to}。您可能無法使用您的帳戶或查看您的帳戶歷史記錄!
settings.networkChangeAccountDetailsWarning: 注意:透過從 %{from} 切換到 %{to},您可能無法使用您的帳戶或查看您的帳戶歷史記錄!
settings.securitySettingsDescription: 在此變更您的密碼或生物識別驗證權限
settings.showReserveValue: 在主畫面顯示保留金額
settings.newOldPasscodeNotMatch: 新密碼與您的確認不相符!
settings.canNotSendLogsByEmail: 發生意外錯誤。無法透過電子郵件發送紀錄!
settings.logsCopiedToClipboard: 連線紀錄已複製到剪貼簿
settings.eraseDataDescription: 10 次密碼錯誤後清除所有資料
settings.biometricUnavailableDescription: 由於您的裝置不提供我們要求的生物識別安全級別,因此無法在您的裝置上使用生物識別安全
settings.successfullyReRegisteredForPushNotificat: 成功重新註冊推送通知。
settings.unableToReRegisteredForPushNotifications: 發生意外錯誤!無法重新註冊推送通知。
settings.changingThemeNeedsRestartToTakeEffect: 變更主題需要重新啟動應用程式才能生效。您要現在重新啟動嗎?
settings.sendPushNotifications: 發送推送通知(透過 Xumm)
settings.areYouSureYouWantRevokeAccess: 您確定要撤銷 %{appName} 的存取權限嗎
settings.unableToRevokeAppAccess: 發生意外錯誤!無法撤銷應用程式存取權限。
settings.noAuthorizedThirdPartyApp: 沒有已授權的第三方應用程式!
settings.onceYouAuthorizedAppYouWillSeeItHere: 一旦您授權第三方應用程式存取,您將在此處看到它們。
settings.unableToDeleteNodeWhenConnectedToNetwork: 連接到此網路時無法移除節點,請切換網路後重試!
settings.developerModeEnabledWarning: 啟用開發者模式可能會降低某些安全功能。請務必謹慎操作,並且只有在您了解潛在後果時才啟用它。
settings.disableDeveloperModeRevertNetworkWarning: 請注意,此操作將把您選擇的網路從「%{currentNetwork}」恢復為「%{defaultNetwork}」。您確定要繼續嗎?
settings.blockingTakingScreenShotsIsDisabled: 開發者模式已啟用,螢幕截圖擷取保護暫時停用。
settings.syncRailsRemoveNetworkWarning: 套用此同步將使您與目前網路(%{currentNetwork})中斷連線。請切換到其他網路後重試。
settings.syncRailsRemoveNodeWarning: 透過套用此同步,您目前連接的目前節點(%{connectedNode})將被移除。請為此網路選擇新的預設節點後重試。
settings.deletingNodeWillRemoveTheNetwork: 這是此網路的唯一節點。移除此節點也將刪除網路。您要繼續嗎?
settings.networkRailsSyncCompleted: 網路 Rails 同步已成功完成。
settings.networkRailsAreAlreadyUpdateToDate: 網路 rails 已是最新
settings.networkRailsSuccessfullyUpdated: 網路 rails 已成功更新
settings.changeDefaultNodeInfo: 點擊清單中的任何節點以將其設定為該網路的首選預設節點。
settings.networkHaveOnlyOneNodeAsDefault: 此網路只有一個節點,已設定為預設。
settings.networkAreUpdateToDate: 目前網路設定沒有新增或變更。
settings.restartRequired: 需要重新啟動才能使這些變更生效

account.degenModeExplanation1: 為了確保您在裝置遺失、被盜或損壞的情況下可以恢復您的帳戶,我們要求您記錄並重新輸入您的帳戶私鑰。
account.degenModeExplanation2: 您可以選擇延後記錄並重新輸入您的帳戶私鑰。將其記錄下來並存放在安全的地方對於保護您的帳戶安全至關重要。
account.safeMode: 現在記錄您的帳戶私鑰(更安全)
account.imSmartPerson: 立即記錄並重新輸入您的帳戶私鑰以進行帳戶恢復。
account.degenBackUpHomeWrn: 如果手機遺失、被盜或損壞,您將無法恢復!
account.imRetard: 稍後記錄並重新輸入:在您這樣做之前,您的所有資金都處於風險之中!
account.degenModeExplanationConfirm: 您確定要繼續嗎?在您記錄帳戶私鑰之前,如果您的手機遺失、被盜或損壞,您將無法恢復您的帳戶。
account.degenModeNowDone: 太好了!您已準備就緒!每當您需要恢復帳戶時,您可以透過匯入剛才記錄的帳戶私鑰來完成。
account.addAccountDescription: 匯入您的現有帳戶,或建立新帳戶。
account.confirmPrivateDescription: 請提供號碼,這是為了您自己的安全:我們希望您確認已記錄下來。
account.invalidSecretNumber: 輸入的號碼與要求的號碼行不符。
account.YouJustCreatedAccount: 您剛剛建立了一個全新的帳戶。
account.pleaseEnterSafePassword: 建立一個長度足夠、容易記住但他人無法猜到的密碼。
account.passwordShouldContain: 您的密碼強度應至少達到「尚可」,請使用更長或更複雜的密碼(越長越好)。
account.chooseWisely: 請選擇適合此帳戶的安全級別
account.passcodeOptionDesc: 這適合日常消費。您可以透過顯示您的臉部、掃描您的指紋或輸入密碼來簽署交易。
account.signWithPasscode: 使用 FaceID / 密碼簽署
account.passwordOptionDesc: 此選項更適合長期儲存 XRP 和代幣,需要密碼才能簽署交易
account.hereIsYourPublicKeyConfirm: 這是您推導出的帳戶地址。
account.hereIsYourPublicKey: 這是您的新帳戶。您現在可以接收資金到產生的公開帳戶地址。
account.publicKeyCopiedToClipboard: 帳戶地址已複製到剪貼簿
account.writeDownPrivateKey: 將所有行記錄在紙上並妥善保管!如果您的裝置損壞且您不再擁有私鑰號碼,您的資金將會遺失。
account.privateKeyRowsDesc: 只有您可以觸碰您的資金,但您必須妥善保管私鑰號碼。您的私鑰由 8 行組成(標記為 A-H),每行包含 6 位數字。
account.neverSharePrivateKey: 絕不與他人分享您的私鑰號碼(私鑰)。如果您這樣做,您可能會失去對資金的存取權。
account.goBackClearTheInput:
您確定要返回嗎?
(出於安全考量,任何已輸入的內容都將被清除)
account.goBackRefillTheInput:
您確定要返回嗎?
(出於安全考量,您必須重新填寫所有輸入)
account.pleaseSelectAccountSecretType: 請選擇您的帳戶私鑰類型
account.tangemCardEmptyGenerateWalletAlert: 您的 Tangem 卡尚未包含 XRP Ledger 帳戶。要使用此卡,必須由卡產生帳戶。
account.tangemLongTapExplain: 此機制可保護卡片免受接近攻擊:它將在接收和執行命令之間強制延遲。
account.tangemPasscodeExplain: 在執行任何涉及變更卡片狀態的命令之前,您必須輸入密碼。
account.tangemAccessCodeExplain: 在執行任何命令之前,您必須輸入存取碼。
account.cardSecuritySuccessfullyChangedTo: 卡片安全性已成功變更為 %{security}
account.tangemNFCNotSupportedDeviceAlert: 使用 Tangem 卡需要 NFC 功能。您的手機似乎不支援 NFC。
account.youCanAlwaysGetFullAccess: 您可以稍後將唯讀帳戶升級為完整存取帳戶
account.secretNumbersDesc: 首選帳戶類型。8 行,每行 6 位數字
account.mnemonicDesc: 基於 12、16 或 24 個單詞
account.pleaseProvideAccountAddress:
請提供您的帳戶地址
(以「r...」開頭)
account.pleaseEnterAllWords: 請輸入您的所有助記詞單詞!
account.pleaseProvideMnemonic: 請提供您帳戶的助記詞(24 個單詞)。
account.howManyWordsYourMnemonicIs: 您的助記詞有幾個單詞?
account.invalidHexPrivateKey: 無效的 HEX 私鑰!HEX 私鑰應為 66 個 HEX 字元
account.pleaseProvideFamilySeed: 請提供您的帳戶私鑰(Family Seed)或 66 個 HEX 字元的私鑰
account.pleaseEnterYourFamilySeed: 輸入您的 Family Seed / 私鑰
account.youJustImportedAccount: 您剛剛新增了您的帳戶
account.pleaseChooseAccountLabel: 請為此帳戶輸入名稱(例如「消費」或「儲蓄」)。
account.accessLevelChangeAlert: Changing from Read Only to Full Access mode will require you to enter the secret key for your account
account.getStartedCreateAccount: Get started by adding your first account.
account.accountSettingsDescription: You can edit your account settings or account label here.
account.upgradingAccessLevelWarning: You are upgrading your access level. You need to import your private key for this account.
account.downgradingAccessLevelWarning: You are downgrading your account access level. Doing so changes your account into a Read Only account, as XUMM will purge the internal, encrypted record of your secret key. You can only access your funds again when you import your secret key again. Only continue if you are certain you have an offline backup of your secret key for this account.
account.downgradingAccessLevelWarningPhysical: You are downgrading your access level. Are you sure?
account.removeTrustLineWarning: You are removing this token from your XRP Ledger account. Are you sure?
account.unavailableChangeSecurityLevel: Changing Security level is not available right now
account.accountRemoveWarning: Your account will be deleted permanently from Xaman. Are you sure?
account.accountMaxLabelLengthError: Account label should be less than 16 characters!
account.accountLabelCannotBeMoreThan: Account label cannot be more than 64 characters!
account.activateRegularKeyAccountWarning:
If you want to use this account as Regular key only, you DO NOT have to activate the account.

However, if you want to use this account also to transact, you can activate this account.
account.selectedAccountIsNotActivatedPleaseChoos: Selected account is not activated. To sign this transaction you need to select an activated account!
account.importingSecretAccountExist:
The account secret that you have entered belongs to this r-address and has already been imported into Xaman as a full access account.

%{address}
account.upgradeAccountSecretIsNotMatch: The entered secret belongs to another r-address. If you want to import a regular key, please [Import new account]. If not, please [cancel] and check your entry.
account.masterKeyForThisAccountDisableRegularKey: Master key for this account is disabled and regular key account not found in accounts list!
account.regularKeyAccountForThisAccountDoesNotIm: Regular Key for this account was not imported with sign access!
account.currentPasswordShouldNotBeEmpty: Current Password should not be empty!
account.enteredCurrentPasswordIsInvalid: The current entered password is invalid!
account.allDoneYouCanGoToNextStepNow: You're all set! You can now go to the next step.
account.disableMasterKeyWarning: The transaction DISABLES the private key for the account. This may lock you out. Only continue if you are absolutely sure this is what you want, and you know what you are doing.
account.mnemonicLargeAmountAlert: If you consider importing your mnemonic account while your account holds significant value (eg. your savings, larger amounts of XRP or other tokens), please consider creating a new account in Xaman to keep your mnemonic account offline instead.
account.importExchangeAddressReadonlyWarning:
It is not possible to import your Exchange (deposit) account. Doing so does not allow you to track your own balance on the exchange.

Importing a read only account only works if this is your own, activated account, like the account of your hardware wallet.
account.readOnlyAccountSpendableBalanceWarning: Please note: The access level for this account is Read-Only. There is currently no way to sign transactions that can affect the account state in any form.
account.deleteAccountWarning: This is an Account Delete transaction. When signing your account will be deleted, and all your remaining funds (except for the last %{ownerReserve} reserved %{na {nativeAsset} tiveAsset}, as the fee on the  XRP ledger for deleting an account is %{ownerReserve} %{nativeAsset}) will be sent to the configured destination. Please check the destination twice, and ONLY continue if you ACTUALLY want to delete your account on the XRP ledger
account.deleteAccountObjectsExistError: You cannot delete this account, because it contains specific XRP ledger objects, like tokens (non-XRP), Decentralized Exchange (DEX) offers, Escrows (as a creator or beneficiary)
account.deleteAccountSequenceIsNotEnoughError: This account cannot be deleted yet. It takes %{remainingSequence} more ledgers to close before this account can be deleted.
account.unableToCheckAccountObjects: Unable to check for account objects, please make sure you are connected to the XRP ledger node
account.unableToCheckAccountNFTs: Unable to check for account NFTs, please make sure you are connected to the XRP ledger node
account.unableToFetchLedgerSequence: Unable to fetch the current ledger sequence. Please make sure you are connected to the XRP Ledger node.
account.unableGetDestinationAccountInfo: Unable to get destination account info, please make sure you are connected to the XRP ledger node
account.unableGetAccountInfo: Unable to fetch account info, please make sure you are connected to the XRP ledger node
account.destinationAccountIsNotActivated: Destination account is not activated, Must be a funded account in the XRP ledger.
account.destinationAddressRequiredDestinationTag: Destination Address requires a Destination Tag
account.destinationAccountAndSourceCannotBeSame: Destination account and source cannot be the same.
account.accountGenerateActivationExplain: Account activation is a requirement on the XRP ledger. To activate, you will have to make a first deposit of at least %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset}.
account.accountImportActivationExplain: You imported a new account on the XRP ledger. The account is not activated. Account activation is a requirement on the XRP ledger. To activate, you will have to make a first deposit of at least %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset}.
account.accountActivateReserveExplain: The first %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset} deposited into your account cannot be spent, but will be reserved to keep your account active and pay for on ledger fees.
account.accountReserveNotShownExplain: Your reserved %{nativeAsset} will not show up as balance in Xaman, but you can view your reserve with the "Explain my balance" button in the home screen, above your %{nativeAsset} balance.
account.thisAddressAppearsToBeExchangeAddress:
This address appears to be an exchange address, are you sure you want to continue?

You can never send to this address without respecting the instructions of your exchange.
account.accountDestroyWarning: Your account will be deleted permanently, are you sure?
account.unableToHideAllAccountsError: Unable to hide this account. At least one account should be visible.
account.unableToHideDefaultAccountError: Unable to hide this default account. Change default account and try again.
account.tapAndHoldToReorder: Tap and hold on an item to reorder by the desired priority
account.toTurnYourSecretIntoXrplLedgerAccountPle: If you want to open an XRP Ledger account, please enter your secret keys.
account.yourXRPLedgerAccountIsGoingToBe: Your XRP Ledger account is going to be:
account.importSecretWithoutChecksumWarning:
If you proceed, you will import an XRP Ledger account from Secret Numbers. You are the sole party responsible to generate the Secret Numbers. We recommend you to use an offline method (eg. with dice) to generate them. After you generated the numbers, you must store them (eg. stamped in metal, written down).
YOU SHOULD PROCEED ONLY IF YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING.
account.tangemCardPasscodeSetWarning:
While adding a passcode to your card improves the safety of your funds in case of a lost (and found) card, it is important to realize that your funds will be INACCESSIBLE and CAN *NOT* BE RECOVERED (by anyone) if you don't remember your passcode.

Are you really sure you want to add a passcode to your card?
account.tangemCardAccessCodeSetWarning:
While adding a access code to your card improves the safety of your funds in case of a lost (and found) card, it is important to realize that your funds will be INACCESSIBLE and CAN *NOT* BE RECOVERED (by anyone) if you don't remember your access code.

Are you really sure you want to add a access code to your card?
account.thereAreAccountsEligibleToSign: There are %{signersCount} accounts eligible to sign. Which one do you want to sign with?
account.signatureVerificationExplain: To verify your Tangem cards is working correctly and able to sign transactions, we will perform one signing routine to verify transaction signatures generated by your card.
account.yourXRPLedgerAccountWillNotBeTouched: Your XRP Ledger account & funds will not be touched.
account.checkWhichAccountsNeedBetterEncryption: Check which accounts need better encryption
account.whyUseThisNewEncryptionMethod: Why use this new encryption method?
account.newEncryptionExplain: Our encryption & security is enhanced to new standards AES256 GCM. You should encrypt your account with this new method to be extra safe. Although you are already safe, it can't hurt to upgrade to the new standards.
account.doNotTurnOffYourPhoneOrQuiteWhileMigrati: Don't turn off your phone or quit the app while doing the encryption.
account.unableToFetchAccountNFTokens: Unable to fetch the account NFT's. Please make sure you are connected to the XRP Ledger node.

send.theDestinationAccountDidNotAuthorize: 目標帳戶未授權此交易。
send.txResultQueuedLongExplain: 您的交易已提交,但目前正在佇列中等待處理。
send.amountIsBiggerThanYourSpend: 此金額大於您可以消費的金額(%{spendable})
send.theMaxDecimalsYouCanSendIs: You can send an amount with a maximum of %{decimals} decimals
send.theMaxAmountYouCanSendIs: The maximum amount you can send is %{spendable} %{currency}
send.theMaxAmountYouCanSendWithFee: The issuer of %{currency} charges a Transfer Fee. The max. amount you can send (respecting the Transfer Fee) is %{spendable} %{currency}
send.trustLineIsFrozenByIssuer: Your Trust Line for the requested asset (%{currency}) has been frozen by the issuer. Please contact the issuer of the asset.
send.balanceIsNotEnoughForFee: Your balance is not enough to cover the fee (%{fee})
send.sourceAndDestinationCannotBeSame: Source and Destination address cannot be the same!
send.enterANameOrAddress: Enter a name or an address
send.transferredSuccessfully: Your transaction has been successfully registered on the %{network}.
send.verificationFailedDescription:
Your transaction has been signed and submitted successfully, however, we could not confirm transaction finality.

This can be caused by an internet connection hiccup or increased load on the XRP Ledger node you are connected to.

Please manually verify if this transaction shows in your transaction history (Events).
send.invalidDestinationTag: The QR-code doesn't contain a valid Destination Tag. Please check the scanned QR-code and try again
send.destinationIsConfirmedAsScam: The destination account is confirmed as SCAM
send.destinationIsProbableIsScam: The destination account is flagged as high risk
send.selectedAccountDoNotSupportAsset: The selected account does not support the selected token.
send.memoPublicWarning: Memo info will be public for everyone
send.destinationNotExistTooLittleToCreate: The destination account hasn't been used before, and doesn't have a balance. To activate an account on the XRP ledger, an initial deposit of at least %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset} is required.
send.destinationNotExistCreationWarning:
Sending to the given destination account may be risky: it has never been used and has a zero balance, which is commonly seen in scams. We advise verifying the owner's authenticity to safeguard your assets. If you're confident in its safety but aware of the risks.

If you continue sending to this account, %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset} of the %{amount} %{nativeAsset} will be used to activate the account on the XRP ledger.
send.destinationCannotActivateWithIOU: The destination account is not activated as it doesn't hold the XRP Ledger enforced minimum balance of %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset}. To activate an account on the XRP Ledger, an initial deposit of at least %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset} has to be sent to the account. Non-%{nativeAsset} tokens cannot be used for the initial deposit.
send.destinationTagIsRequired: The destination tag is required for sending this payment.
send.unableGetRecipientAccountInfoPleaseTryAg: Unable to get recipient account info please try again.
send.unableToSetFeesPleaseTryAgain: Unable to set transaction fees, please try again.
send.theDestinationAccountIsSetAsBlackHole: The destination account is 'Black Holed', sending to this account will cause losin {currency %{currency} } g sent XRP.
send.thisAddressRequiredDestinationTag: This address requires a Destination Tag
send.unableToSendPaymentRecipientDoesNotHaveT:
Unable to send the token to the recipient.
The recipient does not have a TrustLine for this token setup to the issuer of this token.
send.unableToSendPaymentRecipientExceedTrustl:
Unable to send the token to the recipient.
The recipient does exceeds the TrustLine limit for this token.
send.altSendPaymentRecipientDoesNotHaveTrustL: The recipient does not have a TrustLine for this token.

Do you want to send a 'Check' instead, so the recipient can opt in to accept the Check which will create the TrustLine?

The recipient will not see an immediate deposit, but will have to accept your Check in their Requests-tab.

On your end, the Check will temporarily increase your reserve with %{reserve} %{asset}, until either the Check is cashed by the recipient, or cancelled by you.

Do you want to send your payment as A 'Remit' transaction instead?

This will automatically create the Trustline in the recipient's account, but you will pay an extra %{reserve} %{asset} to satisfy their TrustLine reserve.
send.unableToSendPaymentTrustLineLimitIsExcee:
Unable to send the token to the recipient.
The 'Limit' for the amount of tokens the recipient wants to hold is exceeded. The recipient will have to update their TrustLine for the token you're sending with a higher 'Limit' to be able to receive this token.
send.destinationTagWarningConfirm: You are sending to an account with destination tag. Please double check the destination tag: if you send to the wrong tag, you will need support of the Destination to retrieve your funds.
send.sendToAccountWithDisallowNativeAssetFlag: The destination account indicates that it doesn't want to receive %{nativeAsset} payments. Only non-%{nativeAsset} payments can be sent to this destination.
send.unableToSendPaymentNotEnoughLiquidity: Unable to send the payment right now due to lack of liquidity.
send.addressIsUnderInvestigationPleaseCancel: This address is under investigation. Please cancel this transaction.
send.toContinueProvideReasonInYourOwnWords: If you want to continue (not recommended) provide a reason in your own words:
send.pleaseEnterYourReasonToContinue: Please enter your reason to continue

asset.selectAnExchangeAndSelectAsset: 選擇發行者並選擇您想要新增的代幣。
asset.successRemoved: 代幣已成功從您的帳戶移除
asset.trustLineDustRemoveWarning: This TrustLine still contains a really small amount of %{balance} %{currency}. If you continue, it will be sent back to the issuer before your TrustLine is deleted.
asset.dustAmountRemovedYouCanRemoveTrustLineNo: Your dust balance has been sent back to the issuer. The TrustLine can now be eliminated.
asset.addingAssetReserveDescription: Adding a token to your account will increase your enforced account reserve by %{ownerReserve} %{nativeAsset}
asset.unableToRemoveAssetNotInDefaultState: This token cannot be removed from your account. The issuer either added specific settings for this token or their account is not properly configured.
asset.ripplingMisconfigurationWarning: Rippling not turned off for this Trust Line, if you don't know what this is and/or this is not on purpose, please update this setting to prevent potential loss of %{token} tokens
asset.ripplingMisconfigurationWarning2: The TrustLine for this asset does not have 'Rippling' turned off. For regular use, 'Rippling' should be disabled.
asset.lineLimitMisconfigurationWarning: This TrustLine has a limit of zero (0) configured, meaning others cannot send this token to you: you can only hold the token. To be able to receive this token as well, Xaman can update your TrustLine to remove the zero (0) TrustLine limit.
asset.addingTrustLineWarning:
XRPL Labs / Xaman does not endorse any token or token issuer. You should only proceed if you trust the token issuer.
In case of questions or problems regarding the token (TrustLine) you will need to contact the token issuer.

Continue at your own risk.
asset.trustLineIsAlreadyExist: This token already exists. You cannot add the same token again.
asset.issuerAddressCopiedToClipboard: Issuer address copied to the clipboard
asset.unableToLoadListOfTokens: Unable to load the list of tokens!
asset.copyIssuerAddressWarning:
%{issuerAddress}

You are about to copy the Issuer Address. Please note that sending assets to the issuer address will PERMANENTLY BURN THE TOKENS. The Issuer Address for an asset should only be used to verify the legitimacy of the asset.

exchange.successfullyExchanged: 太好了,成功兌換 %{payAmount} %{payCurrency} 為 %{getAmount} %{getCurrency}!
exchange.failedExchange: 由於缺乏流動性或匯率更新,目前無法兌換
exchange.liquidityIsNotEnough: There is not enough liquidity, cannot exchange right now!
exchange.liquidityIsNotSoMuch: There's relatively low liquidity. You can still continue, but you may not get the best rate for your entire exchange!
exchange.theMaxAmountYouCanExchangeIs: The maximum amount you can exchange is %{spendable} %{currency}
exchange.exchangeByThirdPartyMessage: If you want to create an offer for execution at a requested price level, you can use the 3rd party Xaman enabled XRP Toolkit application to create a limit order.
exchange.requestedLiquidityNotAvailable: The amount can't be exchanged: there are not enough offers available on the Decentralized Exchange.
exchange.reverseLiquidityNotAvailable: The amount can't be exchanged: based on the lack of offers on the Decentralized Exchange, you would not be able to exchange it back.
exchange.maxSpreadExceeded: The price difference between selling and buying offers is too high.
exchange.maxSlippageExceeded: The exchange rate will be bad as there are not enough (good) offers on the Decentralized Exchange.
exchange.maxReverseSlippageExceeded: The exchange rate will be bad if you would try to exchange back, as there are not enough (good) offers on the Decentralized Exchange.
exchange.slippageSpreadWarning:
The exchange rate displayed is an estimate based on the current offers available on the XRP Ledger Decentralized Exchange.
When you execute this trade and the liquidity changes while executing your transaction, you may get an up to %{slippage}% worse exchange rate. Please continue only if you accept this.

scan.pleaseScanAccountAddress: 請掃描 %{nativeAsset} 地址 QR 碼
scan.scannedQRIsNotAccountAddress: 掃描的 QR 碼不包含有效的 %{nativeAsset} 地址
scan.theClipboardDataIsNotContainAccountAddre: 剪貼簿資料不包含有效的 %{nativeAsset} 地址
scan.scannedQRIsNotXamanPayload: 掃描的 QR 碼不是 Xaman 載荷!
scan.theClipboardDataIsNotContainXamanPayload: The clipboard data does not contain valid Xaman payload!
scan.theQRIsNotWhatWeExpect: This QR code doesn't contain information we would expect!
scan.invalidQRTryNewOneOrTryAgain: Invalid QR code (for Xaman), try a new one or try again
scan.invalidClipboardDateTryNewOneOrTryAgain: Invalid clipboard data (for Xaman). Try a new one or try again.

payload.payloadHandledByAnotherClient: 載荷由另一個客戶端處理
payload.payloadAlreadyResolved: 此載荷已被簽署或拒絕。請向發送載荷的服務/人員請求新的載荷。
payload.payloadAlreadySigned: The payload has already been signed
payload.invalidOrMissingSignedTransactionBlob: Invalid or missing signed transaction blob
payload.unexpectedPayloadErrorOccurred: The payload is invalid, and will be automatically rejected.
payload.whatDoYouWantToDo: What do you want to do?
payload.willIgnoreTheRequestAndClose: Will ignore the request and close.
payload.notEnoughLiquidityToSendThisPayment: Not enough liquidity to send this payment.
payload.unableToCheckAssetConversion: Unable to verify the token exchange rate. Please make sure you are properly connected to the internet
payload.unableToGetNetworkFee: Unable to get network fee, please make sure you are connected to the XRPL node
payload.checkCanOnlyCashByCheckDestination: A Check can only be cashed if the Check destination account is present in Xaman in Read/Write (or regular key) mode.
payload.unableToGetCheckObject: Unable to get check object. Please make sure you are connected to the XRPL node
payload.checkObjectDoesNotExist: Unable to get the Check object. Please make sure the Check exists on the XRP Ledger.
payload.nonExpiredCheckCanOnlyCancelByCreatedAcc: A (non expired) check can only be cancelled by the account that created it or destination account.
payload.accountDeleteExchangeSupportWarning: Note: when deleting your XRP ledger account and sending the remaining balance to an exchange, make sure the destination exchange supports deposits using AccountDelete transactions. Not all exchanges do, which results in a support procedure with the exchange to get your funds credited to your account
payload.notVettedTokenTradeWarning:
Trade at your own risk! The token you are about to trade **has not been vetted**.

Anyone can create a token, including creating fake versions of existing tokens that claim to represent projects. If you trade this token, you may not be able to sell it back. You are potentially putting your assets/savings at risk!
payload.tradeEntireTokenWorthWarning: Warning: the amount of %{currency} is equal to or higher than your %{currency} balance of this asset. If this offer is executed, you will fully liquidate your %{currency} position.
payload.paymentToDisallowedNativeAssetWarning: The destination account configured their account to disallow incoming %{nativeAsset} (non-token) payments. If you proceed, you will most likely need support from the destination account owner.
payload.paymentToBlackHoledAccountWarning: The destination account is 'black holed', meaning all funds sent to the destination account will be inaccessible & unrecoverable. Are you sure you want to continue sending your funds to this destination account?
payload.unableToFindTheOfferObject: Unable to find the offer object!
payload.theIssuerCanBurnThisToken: Note: The issuer can burn this token.
payload.payloadForceNetworkError: This payload is not available on the network you are connected with
payload.pleaseSwitchToNetworkAndTryAgain: Please switch to %{network} and try again
payload.oracleDocumentIdCopiedToClipboard: Oracle Document Id copied to clipboard
payload.didDeleteWarning: Warning: You are about to delete the Decentralized Identifier (DID) tied to the selected account. Keep in mind, this action cannot be undone.
payload.oracleDeleteWarning: Warning: You are about to delete the oracle record identified by the above Oracle Document ID. Keep in mind, this action cannot be undone.

monetization.oneTimeCharge: 一次性收費 - 不自動續訂
monetization.payWithApplePay: 使用 Apple Pay 付款
monetization.payWithGooglePay: 使用 Google Pay 付款
monetization.comingPaymentWarning: You're still enjoying Xaman for free, but you're nearing our free limit. To support Xaman's innovation and security, a small in-app payment may be requested soon.
monetization.paymentRequiredMessage: A small payment is required to maintain unlimited access for the next 30 days. Alternatively, Xaman will switch to limited-use mode until your monthly limits reset automatically.
monetization.prePurchaseMessage: You're currently unable to open xApps and sign requests. A small payment is required to unlock 30 days of unrestricted access to Xaman.
monetization.monetizationRequiredForThisFeature: You currently can’t open Sign Requests & xApps: a small payment is required to unlock a 30 days of unrestricted use of Xaman. Developing Xaman, building secure software takes a lot of resources. We hope you will support us continuing to build. If you decide not to: every month your limits will reset, allowing you to open xApps & Sign Requests again.
monetization.noPreviousPurchases: We couldn't find any previous purchases to restore. If you believe this is an error, please contact our support team.
monetization.errorRestorePurchase:
An unexpected error occurred while checking your purchase history.

Please try again later or contact our support team if the issue persists.
monetization.couldNotFetchProductDetails: Error fetching product details. Please try again later or contact support if the issue persists.
monetization.unlockFullFunctionality: Unlock full functionality with a small payment.
monetization.prePurchaseTipIos: Please note that this is a 30 days purchase. Make sure your Apple ID is logged in and your payment information is up-to-date. For issues, use the 'Restore Purchase' button.
monetization.prePurchaseTipAndroid: Please note that this is a 30 days purchase. Make sure your Google account is logged in and your payment information is up-to-date. For issues, use the 'Restore Purchase' button.

errors.unableToLoadTermOfService: 糟糕!無法取得服務條款
errors.unableToLoadCredits: 糟糕!無法取得開發人員資訊
errors.unableToLoadChangeLogs: 糟糕!無法取得變更日誌
errors.tecPATH_DRY: 交易失敗,因為無法轉移資金
errors.tecPATH_PARTIAL: 交易失敗,因為沒有足夠的流動性
errors.tecHOOK_REJECTED:
Rejected by hook on sending or receiving account.

%{hookReturnString}

txBatch.title: 批次
txBatch.thisTxIsPartOfBatchTransaction: 此交易是批次交易的一部分。
txBatch.thisIsAnBatchTransaction: This is a Batch transaction with %{signers} separate 'inner Batch transaction' signer(s) and %{txs} transaction(s) in the batch.
txBatch.batchExecution_tfAllOrNothing: atomically, so either they all succeed or they all fail
txBatch.batchExecution_tfOnlyOne: to process only the first successful transaction, all others are either failed or not tried (because one already succeeded)
txBatch.batchExecution_tfUntilFailure: until one fails, all others are either failed or not tried (because others already succeeded)
txBatch.batchExecution_tfIndependent: independently, so they every inner transaction can individually succeed or fail

txDelegateSet.dangerousPerms: 包含具有深遠後果的交易類型
txDelegateSet.thisIsAnDelegateSetTransaction: This is a Delegate Set transaction.
txDelegateSet.itRemovesTheAccountAuthorize: Fully remove (retract) all authorization(s) to the following account:
txDelegateSet.itRemoves: It fully removes (retract(s)) all authorization(s) to the following account: %{authorize}.

txCredentialSet.itInvolvesIssuesACredentialTo: 它涉及 %{from} 向 %{to} 發行 credential。
txCredentialSet.itInvolvesIssuesACredentialFrom: 它涉及由 %{from} 發行的 credential。
txCredentialSet.paymentBeingUsed: This transaction automatically uses a valid Credential you own to authorize this transaction.

mptokenIssuance.explain: 這是一個 MPToken 發行。其他帳戶現在可以授權並持有此 MPToken。

mptoken.errorLoading: 取得 MPToken 詳情時發生錯誤!
mptoken.explain: 這是由 %{issuer} 發行的 MPToken。
mptoken.explainAuthOnly: 這是一個 MPToken 授權:您並未持有 MPToken,但您已授權持有它。
mptoken.issuanceNotFound: Could not fetch MPT issuance details

permissionedDomain.eventThisIsA: 這是一個許可網域。許可網域就像一個存取控制清單。
permissionedDomain.title: 許可網域
permissionedDomain.txThisCreates:
This transaction creates a new Permissioned Domain.

A permissioned domain is like an on chain members-only area, so only credential-verified accounts can participate in certain transactions. This can, for example, allow for regulated spaces within decentralized systems.
permissionedDomain.txThisUpdates: This transaction updates an existing Permissioned Domain.
permissionedDomain.thisTxRemovesDomainId: This transaction removes a Permissioned Domain with the Domain ID: %{domainId}.

depositPreauth.title: 存款預授權
depositPreauth.eventThisIsA: 這是一個存款預授權。存款預授權允許特定帳戶向您發送付款。

cronSet.title: CronSet
cronSet.invalidParams: 無效的 Cron 參數。缺少必填欄位:S 或 tfCronUnset
cronSet.invalidParamsUnset: 「tfCronUnset」交易的 Cron 參數無效。當 tfCronUnset 為 true 時,不應指定其他欄位。
cronSet.setOrUpdate: 此載荷將建立或更新現有的 Cron(排程的 Hook 呼叫)。
cronSet.didCreateOrUpdate: This payload created or updated an existing Cron (scheduled Hook invoke).
cronSet.removeCron: This payload will remove any existing Cron configuration (scheduled Hook invoke).
cronSet.didRemoveCron: This payload removed an existing Cron configuration (scheduled Hook invoke).

xamanServiceFee.updateToMaxSpendingAmount: 您可以發送的最大金額為 %{amount}
xamanServiceFee.updateToSatisfyMissingAmount: 請更新您的交易以最多消費 %{amount}
